00002 /*! _drovector*_dgsmatrix operator */
00003 inline _drovector operator*(const _drovector& vec, const _dgsmatrix& mat)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00006   if(vec.l!=mat.m){
00007     ERROR_REPORT;
00008     std::cerr << "These vector and matrix can not make a product." << std::endl
00009               << "Your input was (" << vec.l << ") * (" << mat.m << "x" << mat.n << ")." << std::endl;
00010     exit(1);
00011   }
00012 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00013   
00014   drovector newvec(mat.n);
00015   newvec.zero();
00016   
00017   for(std::vector<dcomponent>::const_iterator it=mat.data.begin(); it!=mat.data.end(); it++){
00018     newvec(it->j) += vec(it->i)*it->v;
00019   }
00020   
00021   vec.destroy();
00022   mat.destroy();
00023   return _(newvec);
00024 }
